casebody.data:
Argued January 29, STATE OF OREGON, Respondent, v. RICHARD JAMES FOWLER (No. 72-99C), Appellant. 505 P2d 358 William L. Sisemore, Klamath Falls, argued the cause for appellant. With him on the briefs were William Ganong, Jr., and Steven A. Zamsky, Klamath Fahs. Al J. Laue, Assistant Attorney General, Salem, argued the cause for respondent. With him on the brief were Lee Johnson, Attorney General, and John W. Osburn, Solicitor General, Salem.

affirmed January 29, 1973

Before Schwab, Chief Judge, and Foley and Thornton, Judges.
